update() - Method in class haberman.rhizomatics.fsm.Place
Conditional trigger that will set the machine's state to: Place.AppTrigger.enter if the user is within; Place.AppTrigger.exit if the user is at least Constants.DISTANCE_PLACE_VISIBILITY meters away; Place.stop() otherwise.
